lead_paragraph: Hillary Clinton's speech Thursday marks the first time a woman has addressed a major party as its nominee for president. But her speech will not be the first time a woman has delivered a noteworthy or even momentous address to a Democratic or Republican convention.

headline.main: From Roosevelt to Reagan, Notable Women Address Conventions
headline.print_headline: From Roosevelt to Reagan, Notable Women Address Conventions
